results.title: Sexual Dimorphism of Gut Microbiota Dictates Therapeutics Efficacy of Radiation Injuries
results.text_hl: Here, the effects of sexual dimorphism on curative efficiencies of therapeutic agents is examined in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ models of @DISEASE_Sialadenitis @DISEASE_MESH:D012793 @@@irradiation injury@@@. Oral gavage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ ameliorates radiation-induced @DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@hematopoietic injury@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@gastrointestinal tract dysfunction@@@ in male @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, but adversely deteriorates these @DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation syndromes@@@ in female animals.

citations.NLM: Cui M, Xiao H, Li Y, Zhang S, Dong J, Wang B, Zhu C, Jiang M, Zhu T, He J, Wang H, Fan S. Sexual Dimorphism of Gut Microbiota Dictates Therapeutics Efficacy of Radiation Injuries Adv Sci (Weinh). 2019 Nov 6;6(21):1901048. PMID: 31728280

results.title: Comparison of the short term efficacy and tolerability of lovastatin and simvastatin in the management of primary hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: Serious adverse events (clinical and laboratory) were reported in four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ group and three in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group. The most reported nonserious adverse effects were @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@gastrointestinal tract@@@ (15 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ group and 16 in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group) and @DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009140 @@@musculoskeletal@@@ (14 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ group and 11 in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group).

citations.NLM: Frohlich J, Brun LD, Blank D, Campeau L, Crockford P, Curnew G, Dafoe W, Davignon J, Dufour R, Emery G. Comparison of the short term efficacy and tolerability of lovastatin and simvastatin in the management of primary hypercholesterolemia. Can J Cardiol. 1993 Jun;9(5):405-12. PMID: 8348392
